thread.title: James Bonds toughest mission to make Swiss watches cool again
thread.title_full: James Bonds toughest mission to make Swiss watches cool again

title: James Bonds toughest mission to make Swiss watches cool again
text:
James Bond's toughest mission: to make Swiss watches cool again 
Independent.ie Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
A bigger threat than smartwatches is no watches at all, according to Omega President Stephen Urquhart. The maker of luxury watches - some tied to the James Bond movie franchise - that sell on average for more than $6,000 is trying to attract younger consumers. More than half of 16 to 34-year-olds use a mobile phone as their main way to tell the time, according to polls. 
...
